page.title: 08HUNDLETON COUNCIL,PEMBROKE.
page.content: Items discussed at a recent meeting of {Hundleton Community Council}included: Excessive Speeding Through the Village.-Sgt. Muckle of{Dyfed Powys } {Police}attended the meeting to discuss the problem. {Hundleton Riding Club.-}A letter was read from the HUNDLETON RIDING CLUB asking if it would be possible to move the trees in the area to the outside of the land to be used by the club. {Highways._}The Clerk was requested to write to the {Highways Department } asking for something to be done about the pot holes in the Bentless road and also in the school road. {National Park.-}Agreed that a letter be sent to the National Park asking them to check the footpaths running through the community.
